sentences.en: " I raised him up out of nothing , right out of the gutter.
sentences.cn: “ 是我把他从零开始培养起来, 从阴沟里捡起来的.

sentences.en: " If you do I will throw it in the gutter.
sentences.cn: " 如果你这样,我就把它扔了.

sentences.en: He picked her out of the gutter and made her a great lady.
sentences.cn: 他使她脱离贫苦生活,并成为贵妇.
他的双脚踩进屋顶上的导水沟里.

sentences.en: Instead of ending up in jail or in the gutter he was remarkably successful.
sentences.cn: 他最后不但没有坐牢或流落贫民窟，反而还非常成功。

sentences.en: It is supposed to be washed down the gutter and into the city's vast sewerage system.
sentences.cn: 它应该是被沿排水沟冲入城市庞大的排水系统。

sentences.en: The azygos vein ascends in the right paravertebral gutter.
sentences.cn: 奇静脉在右侧脊柱旁沟内上升.

sentences.en: The creeper is growing in towards the gutter, and should be cleared away.
sentences.cn: 蔓草往沟里生长, 应该除掉.

sentences.en: The gutter press has held the royals up to ridicule.
sentences.cn: 黄色报刊公然奚落皇室成员。

sentences.en: The gutter took away the rain - water from the roof.
sentences.cn: 檐沟把从屋顶流下的雨水带走.

sentences.en: The gutters were blocked and overflowing.
sentences.cn: 排水沟堵住了，水都溢出来了。

sentences.en: The motorbike lay on its side in the gutter.
There's a cigarette packet thrown into the gutter.
Tina was a pale little gutter girl.
sentences.cn: 蒂娜是个脸色苍白的贫民区的小女孩.

sentences.en: Water was running in the gutter.

words.tran_cn: 贫贱的；粗俗的；耸人听闻的

trans.tran_cn: 贫贱的；粗俗的；耸人听闻的
（路边）排水沟，（屋顶的）天沟，贫民窟
trans.tran_en: the low part at the edge of a road where water collects and flows away

trans.tran_cn: 在沟槽或小溪中流淌，淌蜡，（烛火）风中摇晃
形成沟或槽于…，为…装檐槽
